SELECT DISTINCT ticket_opendate * FROM (SELECT screencontent_no, movie_no, TO_CHAR(screencontent_regdate,'YYYY/MM/DD') screencontent_regdate , TO_CHAR(screen_date,'YYYY/MM/DD') screen_date , TO_CHAR(screen_opentime,'HH24:MI') screen_opentime, TO_CHAR(screen_endtime,'HH24:MI') screen_endtime, screen_theater, ticket_price, preview_flag, preview_title, TO_CHAR(ticket_opendate-1/(24*60)*30,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') ticket_opendate,invite_actor
FROM screencontent WHERE ticket_opendate-1/(24*60)*30 >= sysdate AND TO_CHAR(ticket_opendate-1/(24*60)*30, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
